Text: Newsletter Galerie Haus Schneider September Dear Mr Shankman last Friday our new show Painters Sculptors Johannes Hppi Nikolaus List Thaddus Hppi Marcus Weber was opened with great success All visitors including some curators where enthusiastic about the show and the works Many works where already sold at the opening reception Unfortunately we where not able to update our website properly until yesterday Now all information images exhibition view press release etc are on the site If you visited our site and if you where wondering about the little information about the show a revisit is a good idea The pages about the show are linked directly from our start page at We also would like to inform you that we will participate at the following artfairs ART COLOGNE October November Booth A ART ATHINA Athens Greece November November We will send you another newsletter about our participation at those fairs in the next weeks Warmest regards HeinzMartin Weigand Galerie Haus Schneider
Merry ChristmasDear Mr Shankman we wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year Warmest regards Ursula Kolb HeinzMartin Weigand Galerie Haus Schneider
